Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • NPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Companion, Mob, Vendor

    public class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    Every NPC type will extend this class that gives each NPC a name, health, conversation hashtable, and a current room that is read in from a file. Along with getters for each field.
    Author:
    Kaylee Payne, Jacques Troussard

      • interact

        public java.lang.String interact(java.lang.String prompt)
        Returns the correct responce from the NPC's conversation Hashtable based off of a String prompt.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The user's conversation prompt that will be a key for a response in conversation.
        Returns:
        converse The string response with the key of prompt.
